name: 禁区
description:
This game is a big team shooting game that took a year and a half to make.
The game supports the first person and the third person.
Background: In the future, intelligent robots generate autonomy in the process of self-iteration, and they decide to overthrow the rule of human beings. The player will play the role of a human soldier, defeated by a robot attack.

The game consists of four levels, each of which supports solo and multiplayer play.
The game includes automatic rifles, shotguns, submachine guns, pistols, grenades and other props.
In the game, players can collect weapons, ammunition, medical and other props in the level, kill the enemy and complete the target task to win.

The purchase of this game will include the game body.


High-precision modeling, supporting multi-person online
Realistic dynamic weather system

Real day and night switching
